oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Variety Recommended Lists of Organic Cereals in Emilia-Romagna
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Piazza, C.
Foutry, H.
Reggiani, R.
Poli, M.
Bolognesi, S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In order to meet the needs of Emilia-Romagnaâ€™s technicians and farmers, specific trials on cereals (soft wheat, hard wheat, barley, corn) for organic production have been carried out since 1995. These trials helped draw up specific Variety Recommended Lists.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Piazza, C.; Foutry, H.; Reggiani, R.; Poli, M. and Bolognesi, S. (2008) Variety Recommended Lists of Organic Cereals in Emilia-Romagna. Poster at: Cultivating the Future Based on Science: 2nd Conference of the International Society of Organic Agriculture Research ISOFAR, Modena, Italy, June 18-20, 2008.
